title: Akron Beacon Journal - Wikipedia
snippet: The Akron Beacon Journal is a morning newspaper in Akron, Ohio, United States. Owned by Gannett, it is the sole daily newspaper in Akron and is distributed throughout Northeast Ohio. The paper's coverage focuses on local news. The Beacon Journal has won four Pulitzer Prizes: in 1968, 1971, ...

title: Beacon Journal owner GateHouse Media acquires Gannett
snippet: GateHouse Media, the company that owns the Akron Beacon Journal and nine other Ohio newspapers, on Monday announced its long-planned acquisition of Gannett, creating the nation’s largest newspaper ch…
